attributes.action: Resign before doing any more damage to our country by 'Pressing Ahead' with unjust, unpopular and undemocratic policies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Iraq War, Road Pricing, the pension debacle... Enough is enough, please leave now before doing any more damage to our country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
